title: Microphone issues. People can't hear me on calls when using headphones but normal call is fine
content: People can't hear me on calls when using phone or what's app when I'm with headphones , try different headphones. Lower microphone is not working I record myself with headphones on and I can't hear me . Voice is low and ecco
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
